Locale.LimitWindowMP3: {0} is enough to store <Run FontWeight="Bold">{1} mp3</Run> songs or <Run FontWeight="Bold">{2} photos</Run>. Get your space back!
Locale.LimitWindowLikeDescription: Go to our Facebook page by clicking the button below and <Run FontWeight="Bold">hit ‘Like’</Run>. Now you are ready to explore the hidden features. It’s easy - just follow the instructions and get activated at a glance!
